Package com.hexaware.controller

Interface IVirtualArtGallery

All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualArtGalleryControl
public interface IVirtualArtGallery
Interface for controlling operations in the Virtual Art Gallery. Defines methods for managing artworks, user favorites.
Since:
2024-02-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vikrant Bathe
